ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work was made possible by NPRP Grant # NPRP10-0126-170254 from the Qatar National Research Fund (QNRF), member of Qatar Foundation (QF). Also, our thanks are due to Kamal Mroue (Core Labs, QEERI) for NMR and IR measurements, to Ayman Samara (Core Labs, QEERI) for the viscosity, TGA and DSC measurements, Reshma Remanan for the support with the MS analysis, and to Simjo Simson (QEERI) for the water content analysis.
